body: It's okay to not like pickles on your CFA sandwich. Know why? Cause the chicken is marinated in pickle juice. You're not removing a flavor, just a texture, and it's okay to have texture preference in food.
body_html: It's okay to not like pickles on your CFA sandwich. Know why? Cause the chicken is marinated in pickle juice. You're not removing a flavor, just a texture, and it's okay to have texture preference in food.

post.title: If you take the pickles off your Chick-Fil-A sandwhich you're lame

body: They make the bun soggy. I also don't like the fact that, being that the pickle is so much smaller than the bun, any random bite may or may not include pickle. I don't like random changes in the chewing experience where I bite into something a moment later and the texture changes. I take them off, but I still eat the pickles. I'm fine with pickles, just not on bread. Tomatoes and onions are out for the same reason.
body_html: They make the bun soggy. I also don't like the fact that, being that the pickle is so much smaller than the bun, any random bite may or may not include pickle. I don't like random changes in the chewing experience where I bite into something a moment later and the texture changes. I take them off, but I still eat the pickles. I'm fine with pickles, just not on bread. Tomatoes and onions are out for the same reason.
